column1: Smoque BBQ////Amazing barbecue!  Dry rub on all with a choice of delicious sauces to enhance the smoky almost carmelized flavor (instead of cover the lack of flavor that some BBQ places do).  Catered for our wedding.  Prompt delivery
column2: excellent service before the event and upon delivery
column3: everything was perfect according to our order
column5: and even delivered 45 minutes away for us.  Thanks!
